channel.title: BentonScape | 508 Maps | Dragon Platebody | Coloured Whips | Corrupt Armours
channel.description:
_Welcome Moparscape. :) _BentonScape The #1 RuneScape Private Server Ever. :) _Please No Hate / Flame Comments, Thanks. :) _I Used A Project Insanity Base, Credit To Insanity For That. :)
_Thank You For All The Good Luck's Guys Im Going To Continue My Work Now. :) _Im Uploading Pictures Today So Check Them Out. :)
_Server Features: _100% Skills With Every Correct EXP Rates. _Dragon Platebody - No Flashing Animations. _Corrupt Dragon - No Bugs And All In Correct Item Slots. _Corrupt PvP Armours - Statius, Morigans, Zurials, Vestas. _100% Safe / Wild Zones - Just Like RuneScape 2012. _Awesome Custom Welcome Screen - Ill Give A Image. _100% Coloured Whips - New Whip Not Old One. _100% Every Dungeoneering Armours - Including Argonite. _Primal Full - With Platebody. _Promethium Full - With Platebody. _Argonite Full - With Platebody. _100% Handcannon - No Flashing Animations. _100% Spell Books - And Prayers. _100% Altars - Lunar - Ancient - Normal - Guthix. _100% Equiptment Stats And Items Kept On Death. _PvP / Pk Shop. _100% Make-Over Mage - Awesome Arrow Buttons Too. _100% Bank Chests. _100% Party Room With Balloons And Chest. _Summoning And Dungeoneering Skilcapes - Trimmed And Non-Trimmed. _Ring Of Recoil In PvP / Pk Shops - With Correct Stats - Nice And Cheap. _Full Dragon (G) And Full Dragon (T) - With Platebodys. _Staff Of Light - With Autocast. _100% Godswords - Correct Hits - Correct Stats - Correct Stances - And Finally Correct Specail Attacks All Working. _100% Teleport Tabs - With Awesome Teleport Emote Thing. _New Wildzone Icon. _100% Multi Pking At Falador. _100% Working Clan Chat - With Working Lootshare. _100% Brimhaven Dungeon - With All Correct NPCs. _100% Taverly Dungeon - With All Correct NPCs. _100% Bossed: *Giant Sea Snake. *Avatar Of Destruction. *Tormented Demons. *Corp' Beast. *Penance Queen. *Ice Strykewrym. *God Wars. *100% KBD. *Dagannoth Kings. *Nomad. _100% Slayer Tower - With All Correct NPCs. _508 Maps - 602 NPCs. _100% Clan Wars. _100% Bounty Hunter. _100% 45 Portals. _100% Mage Bank - With Working Lever. _100% Edgeville Pking - With Correct Wildy Levels _100% Wildy Ditch The Whole Way Along The Map - No Bugs Or Flashings. _100% Skillcape Emotes - Dungeoneering Is Awsome. _New Wrench Tab - 100% By Me - Dunno How Lol. _100% Deposit Box - Fixed Bug Where Items Went Of The Face Of Earth. _100% Castle Wars / Battle Grounds - With Point Exchange. _100% Pest Control - With Timed Games And You Only Get Points If You Attacked The Portals. _100% Tz-Tok-Jad - With 64 Waves. _Tzhaar. _100% Pest Control. _100% Duel Arena - With Stakeing. _Optional Skilling Teleport Menu. _100% Trading And Shops. _100% Banking - With Deposit Box And Tabs. + Much Much More Awesome Features To Come.
_Server Commands: _Normal Player Commands: _::Help. _::Pure. _::Players. _::VisitJail. _::MyPkPoints. _::Staff List. _::Donate. _::Yell. _::Money - Only Gives You 500GP Not 2147000000M That Base Had. _::Runes - Only Gives You 10 Runes Not 2147000000M That Base Had. + Much Much More Awesome Normal Player Commands To Come.
_Moderator Commands: _::Jail. _::HelpDesk _::UnJail. _::Xteleto. _::Xteletome. _::Kick. _::Ban. _::Mute. _::StaffMoney. _::StaffRares. _::ModZone. _::ModMessage - Sends Message To All Moderators. + All Normal Player Commands. + Much Much More Awesome Moderator Commands To Come.
_Administrator And Hidden Administrator Commands: _::IPJail. _::Master. _::IPMute. _::IPBan. _::StaffMoney. _::AdminZone. _::AdminMessage - Sends Message To All Moderators And Administrators. _::StaffRares. + All Normal Player Commands. + All Moderator Commands. + Much Much More Awesome Administrator Commands.
_Owner And Co-Owner Commands: _::SnowOn. _::SnowOff. _::KickAll. _::BanAll. _::Update. _::MuteAll. _::Reboot. _::SystemMessage. _::KillAll. _::AddItem. _::AddItemToAll. _::GiveMaster. _::GiveMod. _::GiveAdmin. _::GiveCo-Owner. _::ForcePlayerBank. _::ForcePlayerEmote. _::SkyChange _::SkyChange2 _::SkyChange3 _::SkyChange4 _::SkyChangeNormal + All Normal Player Commands. + All Moderator Commands. + All Administrator Commands. + Much Much More That You Dont Need To Know About.
_PICTURES: _Uploading Them Today Guys!
NOTICE: Who Ever Helps Me Quite Alot With My Server I Will Personaly Give You A Copy Of My Source Download So That You Can See Everything And I Will Give You My Permission To Make A Loader / Build A Server From It. NOTICE: You May eMail Me To Get Involved In The BentonScape Server Development. NOTICE: My eMail Adress: BentonScape@Hotmail.Co.Uk.
Thank You For Reading I Hope You Enjoyed Please Dont Dislike / Flame + If You Need Any Help Feel Free To eMail Me Using The eMail Adress Above. Thanks - Owner Joe.

Add some pictures to go with your information, it could help.

item.title: BentonScape | 508 Maps | Dragon Platebody | Coloured Whips | Corrupt Armours
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

_Welcome Moparscape.
_BentonScape The #1 RuneScape Private Server Ever.
_Please No Hate / Flame Comments, Thanks.
_I Used A Project Insanity Base, Credit To Insanity For That.

_Thank You For All The Good Luck’s Guys Im Going To Continue My Work Now.
_Im Uploading Pictures Today So Check Them Out.

_Server Features:
_100% Skills With Every Correct EXP Rates.
_Dragon Platebody - No Flashing Animations.
_Corrupt Dragon - No Bugs And All In Correct Item Slots.
_Corrupt PvP Armours - Statius, Morigans, Zurials, Vestas.
_100% Safe / Wild Zones - Just Like RuneScape 2012.
_Awesome Custom Welcome Screen - Ill Give A Image.
_100% Coloured Whips - New Whip Not Old One.
_100% Every Dungeoneering Armours - Including Argonite.
_Primal Full - With Platebody.
_Promethium Full - With Platebody.
_Argonite Full - With Platebody.
_100% Handcannon - No Flashing Animations.
_100% Spell Books - And Prayers.
_100% Altars - Lunar - Ancient - Normal - Guthix.
_100% Equiptment Stats And Items Kept On Death.
_PvP / Pk Shop.
_100% Make-Over Mage - Awesome Arrow Buttons Too.
_100% Bank Chests.
_100% Party Room With Balloons And Chest.
_Summoning And Dungeoneering Skilcapes - Trimmed And Non-Trimmed.
_Ring Of Recoil In PvP / Pk Shops - With Correct Stats - Nice And Cheap.
_Full Dragon (G) And Full Dragon (T) - With Platebodys.
_Staff Of Light - With Autocast.
_100% Godswords - Correct Hits - Correct Stats - Correct Stances - And Finally Correct Specail Attacks All Working.
_100% Teleport Tabs - With Awesome Teleport Emote Thing.
_New Wildzone Icon.
_100% Multi Pking At Falador.
_100% Working Clan Chat - With Working Lootshare.
_100% Brimhaven Dungeon - With All Correct NPCs.
_100% Taverly Dungeon - With All Correct NPCs.
_100% Bossed:
*Giant Sea Snake.
*Avatar Of Destruction.
*Tormented Demons.
*Corp’ Beast.
*Penance Queen.
*Ice Strykewrym.
*God Wars.
*100% KBD.
*Dagannoth Kings.
*Nomad.
_100% Slayer Tower - With All Correct NPCs.
_508 Maps - 602 NPCs.
_100% Clan Wars.
_100% Bounty Hunter.
_100% 45 Portals.
_100% Mage Bank - With Working Lever.
_100% Edgeville Pking - With Correct Wildy Levels
_100% Wildy Ditch The Whole Way Along The Map - No Bugs Or Flashings.
_100% Skillcape Emotes - Dungeoneering Is Awsome.
_New Wrench Tab - 100% By Me - Dunno How Lol.
_100% Deposit Box - Fixed Bug Where Items Went Of The Face Of Earth.
_100% Castle Wars / Battle Grounds - With Point Exchange.
_100% Pest Control - With Timed Games And You Only Get Points If You Attacked The Portals.
_100% Tz-Tok-Jad - With 64 Waves.
_Tzhaar.
_100% Pest Control.
_100% Duel Arena - With Stakeing.
_Optional Skilling Teleport Menu.
_100% Trading And Shops.
_100% Banking - With Deposit Box And Tabs.

  • Much Much More Awesome Features To Come.

_Server Commands:
_Normal Player Commands:
_::Help.
_::Pure.
_::Players.
_::VisitJail.
_::MyPkPoints.
_::Staff List.
_::Donate.
_::Yell.
_::Money - Only Gives You 500GP Not 2147000000M That Base Had.
_::Runes - Only Gives You 10 Runes Not 2147000000M That Base Had.

  • Much Much More Awesome Normal Player Commands To Come.

_Moderator Commands:
_::Jail.
_::HelpDesk
_::UnJail.
_::Xteleto.
_::Xteletome.
_::Kick.
_::Ban.
_::Mute.
_::StaffMoney.
_::StaffRares.
_::ModZone.
_::ModMessage - Sends Message To All Moderators.

  • All Normal Player Commands.
  • Much Much More Awesome Moderator Commands To Come.

_Administrator And Hidden Administrator Commands:
_::IPJail.
_::Master.
_::IPMute.
_::IPBan.
_::StaffMoney.
_::AdminZone.
_::AdminMessage - Sends Message To All Moderators And Administrators.
_::StaffRares.

  • All Normal Player Commands.
  • All Moderator Commands.
  • Much Much More Awesome Administrator Commands.

_Owner And Co-Owner Commands:
_::SnowOn.
_::SnowOff.
_::KickAll.
_::BanAll.
_::Update.
_::MuteAll.
_::Reboot.
_::SystemMessage.
_::KillAll.
_::AddItem.
_::AddItemToAll.
_::GiveMaster.
_::GiveMod.
_::GiveAdmin.
_::GiveCo-Owner.
_::ForcePlayerBank.
_::ForcePlayerEmote.
_::SkyChange
_::SkyChange2
_::SkyChange3
_::SkyChange4
_::SkyChangeNormal

  • All Normal Player Commands.
  • All Moderator Commands.
  • All Administrator Commands.
  • Much Much More That You Dont Need To Know About.

_PICTURES:
_Uploading Them Today Guys!

NOTICE: Who Ever Helps Me Quite Alot With My Server I Will Personaly Give You A Copy Of My Source Download So That You Can See Everything And I Will Give You My Permission To Make A Loader / Build A Server From It.
NOTICE: You May eMail Me To Get Involved In The BentonScape Server Development.
NOTICE: My eMail Adress: BentonScape@Hotmail.Co.Uk.

Thank You For Reading I Hope You Enjoyed Please Dont Dislike / Flame + If You Need Any Help Feel Free To eMail Me Using The eMail Adress Above.
Thanks - Owner Joe.
